title: Shop
content:
You can buy set packages from the shop, please open a ticket via <#1152707745808650321> and choose the 'Purchase from Shop' option, take note of the package ID you wish to purchase.

*NOTE: Purchases are not immediate and require manual review by an admin, please be patient after paying.*

title: #1 - Tier 1 Base Bundle ($2.00)
content:
- Tier 1 Workbench
- x2 Sheet Metal Door
- x3,000 Wood
-x3,000 Stone
-x1 Furnace
- x1 Sleeping Bag
- x4 Large Wooden Box
-x1 Pump Shotgun
- x10 12 Guage Buckshot
- x1 Wetsuit
- x1 Hatchet
- x1 Metal Pickaxe
